Rwanda - Projet national de recherche agricole

abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Research Project in
            Rwanda aimed at: (i) preparing a research master plan as the
            basis for the long-term development of agricultural
            research; (ii) streamlining ISAR's research and
            financial management system though the introduction of
            program based research and research financing and (iii)
            establishing a long-term manpower development. The main
            reasons for the long implementation delay were: (i) the
            extremely difficult budgetary situation, aggravated by an
            uncontrolled increase in mainly subordinate staff; (ii) the
            very slow implementation of all component related to
            research programming and management including the
            preparation of the research master plan; and (iii)
            procurement problems.
